lead_paragraph: Matthew Libous, whose father, Thomas W. Libous, is accused of lying to federal agents, faces up to three years in prison for filing false tax returns.
snippet: Matthew Libous, whose father, Thomas W. Libous, is accused of lying to federal agents, faces up to three years in prison for filing false tax returns.

headline.main: Son of Indicted New York State Senator Is Found Guilty in Tax Case
